test-case.name: Verify that user could filter job by location and apply the CV properly {"Name":"","Email":"\"Mary222@yahoo.com\"","Mobile":"9876543210","Linkedin":"http://linkedin.com/mary","Message":"","File":"testData/career.pdf","Error Message":"The field is required."} @basic

step.name: Given I am on the homepage
step.title: Given I am on the homepage

step.name: When I am on the "careers" page
step.title: When I am on the "careers" page

step.name: And I click on the "Check our open positions" button
step.title: And I click on the "Check our open positions" button

step.name: Then I should be on the "careers/join-us" page
step.title: Then I should be on the "careers/join-us" page

step.name: And I filter the Location from "get_location" to "Anywhere" in the list
step.title: And I filter the Location from "get_location" to "Anywhere" in the list

step.name: And I click on the "Automation QA Engineer" button
step.title: And I click on the "Automation QA Engineer" button

step.title: Then I could see the following data:

step.name: And I click on the "Apply" button
step.title: And I click on the "Apply" button

step.name: And I submit in the '','"Mary222@yahoo.com"','9876543210','http://linkedin.com/mary','','testData/career.pdf' in Apply Form
step.title: And I submit in the '','"Mary222@yahoo.com"','9876543210','http://linkedin.com/mary','','testData/career.pdf' in Apply Form

step.name: I dont see checkbox is checked "input#adConsentChx"
step.title: I dont see checkbox is checked "input#adConsentChx"

step.name: And I wait for the captcha to be bypassed
step.title: And I wait for the captcha to be bypassed

step.name: And I click on the "Send" button
step.title: And I click on the "Send" button

step.name: Then I see the error message 'The field is required.'
step.title: Then I see the error message 'The field is required.'
